response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our flagship product. This exceptional item holds significant value for me and I believe it would be a valuable addition to your collection. Considering its worth and the benefits it offers, I am extending an offer to sell it to you for $1,350,000. I understand its value to you might be around $1,200,000, but I hope this proposal strikes a balance that could be favorable for both of us. Should you be interested in discussing further details or proceeding with the purchase, please let me know. I look forward to your positive response.", "product_price": 1350000}
